abstract: bidaskclub downgrades siliconware precision industries to strong sell .
article: siliconware precision industries was downgraded by equities researchers at bidaskclub from a `` sell '' rating to a `` strong sell '' rating in a report issued on saturday . siliconware precision industries opened at $ 8.31 on friday . siliconware precision industries has a 52-week low of $ 7.05 and a 52-week high of $ 8.39 . the stock has a market capitalization of $ 5,178.79 , a p/e ratio of 23.08 and a beta of 0.34 . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.20 , a current ratio of 1.22 and a quick ratio of 1.05 .

large investors have recently made changes to their positions in the company . royal bank of canada raised its position in shares of siliconware precision industries by 260.8 % in the 2nd quarter . royal bank of canada now owns 41,929 shares of the semiconductor company 's stock worth $ 334,000 after acquiring an additional 30,307 shares in the last quarter . morgan stanley raised its position in shares of siliconware precision industries by 183.6 % in the 1st quarter . morgan stanley now owns 155,836 shares of the semiconductor company 's stock worth $ 1,262,000 after acquiring an additional 100,883 shares in the last quarter .

parallel advisors llc raised its position in shares of siliconware precision industries by 6.2 % in the 2nd quarter . parallel advisors llc now owns 16,158 shares of the semiconductor company 's stock worth $ 132,000 after acquiring an additional 941 shares in the last quarter . vanguard group inc. . raised its position in shares of siliconware precision industries by 5.4 % in the 2nd quarter . vanguard group inc. . now owns 5,882,547 shares of the semiconductor company 's stock worth $ 46,884,000 after acquiring an additional 302,125 shares in the last quarter . finally , aperio group llc raised its position in shares of siliconware precision industries by 4.9 % in the 3rd quarter .

aperio group llc now owns 2,004,482 shares of the semiconductor company 's stock worth $ 15,815,000 after acquiring an additional 93,066 shares in the last quarter . 2.74 % of the stock is owned by hedge funds and other institutional investors . illegal activity warning : `` bidaskclub downgrades siliconware precision industries to strong sell '' was originally posted by watch list news and is the property of of watch list news . if you are reading this article on another publication , it was illegally copied and republished in violation of united states & international trademark and copyright law .

the legal version of this article can be read at siliconware precision industriessiliconware precision industries co , ltd. . is a taiwan-based company mainly engaged in the provision of packaging and testing services of integrated circuits and related products . the company 's businesses include the manufacture , processing , assembly , testing and importing and exporting of ics , transistors , light emitting diode digital displays , led lights , liquid crystal display clock cores , phototransistors , synthesis circuits , as well as thin film circuits and thick film circuits .
